title: STUDIO APT 1st floor
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Studio that looks out to front yard and the parking driveway,  This a large house with  3 other apartments, a quiet building on a quiet block, also one block from bus route.  Air conditioner, coin laundry,  non smoking, will need your own bed,  wi-fi, and table/chairs… 900 block of 6th Ave No lease,  $800. a mo.  $400. deposit 708-843-1616
